title: Are Trump's signature tariffs even legal?
shortDescription: Rising health care costs, limits on executive power and two ongoing conflicts are all substantive issues Trump faces in the new year as midterms near.

title: 'Stop the threats' about Greenland, Denmark's leader urges Trump
shortDescription: The White House's moves in Venezuela have elevated again concerns in Copenhagen that the same could happen with Greenland, a Danish territory.

title: Is Greenland next? Trump renews takeover calls after Venezuela strike
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has repeatedly talked about annexing Greenland. He reupped those calls hours after the U.S. captured Venezuela's leader.

title: ¿Trump pone en la mira a México y Colombia? Presión tras Venezuela
shortDescription: Trump eleva la presión regional tras Venezuela y lanza mensajes a México, Colombia y Cuba, reavivando tensiones sobre narcotráfico y soberanía.

title: Trump says US 'in charge' of Venezuela as Maduro awaits arraignment
shortDescription: After a whirlwind Saturday ending in the capture of Nicolás Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, the pair is in U.S. custody awaiting arraignment.

title: What is the Monroe Doctrine? Trump calls it the 'Donroe Doctrine'
shortDescription: In remarks following the early morning capture of Venezuela's leader and his wife, Trump referred to a nearly 200-year-old foreign policy doctrine.

title: After Venezuela raid, is Cuba next? Trump says it's worth discussing.
shortDescription: The president also reiterated aggressive comments toward Colombia’s leader, who denigrated the Trump administration as a "clan of pedophiles."

title: Mamdani says he called Trump after Maduro's arrest
shortDescription: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani said he called President Trump to voice his opposition to the arrest of Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro.
